description:
NTS Map: 093H08
The trail follows the Ozalenka creek for 7 km to the Ozalenka hut. The hut is operated by the Ozalenka Alpine Club. To reserve call 250-569-2596.
directions: Drive a couple of kilometers west of McBride on the Yellowhead highway to the West Dore River Forest Road. It is located south of the highway next to the Dore River. Drive in the summer time 19 km to the trail head. In the winter the road is not plowed so snow mobile access is the most common access mode. The trail head has a sign and the trail is marked with flagging and markers. The hut coordinates are N53 17 51 W120 27 51.
title: Ozalenka Hut
